fields.Title of Contribution: Rothberger Bounded Groups and Ramsey Theory
fields.Description/Abstract:
We show that:
(1) 	Rothberger bounded subgroups of ?-compact groups are characterized by Ramseyan partition relations (Corollary 4).
(2) 	For each uncountable cardinal ? there is a T0 topological group of cardinality ? such that ONE has a winning strategy in the point-open game on the group and the group is not a closed subspace of any ?-compact space (Theorem 8).
(3) 	For each uncountable cardinal ? there is a T0 topological group of cardinality ? such that ONE has a winning strategy in the point-open game on the group and the group is ?-compact (Corollary 17).
